attributes.title: No help
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if I could find a reason to support this Donald trump person and all I found was reason to no want or like him as my president

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Dumb Trump is a White supremacists and if you vote for him everybody’s in danger I am a Donald Trump  supporter but this app is not it this is horrible so I’m never voting for Donald Trump again please delete this app now so apps like TikTok wouldn’t be deleted☹️☹️

attributes.title: Don’t do it
attributes.review: There’s a bug in the software and it glitches your phone if you don’t close out of the app. Best to leave this one in the trash.

attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE
attributes.review: It’s abt this man who doesn’t care much abt human right and only himself, who has a big enough ego to create rallies with huge amounts of ppl during a pandemic with ppl dying and not wearing a mask because it’s a sign of “weakness”

attributes.title: This app gives you explosive diarrhea🤮💩
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and just scrolled through and then all of the crap give me explosive diarrhea and I am with died because of it I do not recommend this app it is evil DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: There’s so many bugs. It’s slow. It deleted half of my content on my phone. It put a virus on my phone. It’s truly an awful experience. You can download it IF YOU WANT TO DESTROY YOUR PHONE. ITS THE WORST.

attributes.title: Trump 2020👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.review: Worse app ever!!!!!! I love trump but the app took forever to download!!! It didn’t give me all the information I needed and NEVER sent me notifications!! Whoever made this app is disrespecting trump and America!!!!!!!! Get it together trump 2020 app. #trump2020

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: whenever you open this app it plays a big boom and it gave my whole family ptsd now they have all went into shock. delete the app please💞🥰😍

attributes.title: This app is a scam
attributes.review: #1 this app took ok so much storage and took about 2 days to download it’s a low quality app with fake news I despise this app if i could i would rate it a 0 star

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever used. all i wanted to do was support our racist president through this app 🧚🏻✨and it took so long to download 😢 after the long download the app started blasting music as i launched it. all of a sudden hundreds of trumpies raided my house and stole all of my american flags and trump flags! oh no!! they also took my shoes! 💔it’s a shame i can’t support my president!!! sigh! #manny2020
